description:
A panier disguised as a messenger bag. When heading into the office, or uni, the Office bag makes cycle commuting a breeze. With internal dividers much like you would expect in a messenger bag, this bag helps keep you organized. The svelte mounting system doesn’t get in the way when the bag is shouldered, and quickly clicks onto your bike when it is time to ride.

  • Rugged Cordura® nylon with a waterproof PU coating
  • Ergonomic carry handle and padded shoulder strap for comfy off-bike carry
  • Inner compartment with zippered pockets helps keep you organized
  • Low profile QL 3.1 mounting system makes carry comfortable
  • Included QL 3.1 adapter is highly adjustable, fitting on racks of all shapes and sizes
  • Mountable on the left (standard) or the right side
  • Highly reflective 3M™ Scotchlite™ reflectors
  • Feet on the bottom of the bag keep it upright and off the ground
name: Ortlieb Office Bag
